name: One Page Checkout for WooCommerce
author: Thien Tran

sections.description:
Merge cart and checkout pages into one. Now the checkout page from your Woocommerce store will be more convenient, easy to use and beautiful interface than ever.

A few notes about the sections above:

  • Fast and intuitive one page checkout.
  • Skip Cart and redirect to Checkout.
  • Change Quatity on checkout page.
  • Ajax supported all sections.
  • Mobile Friendly.
  • Change the VND currency symbol to anything, e.g: $ to Dolar, USD, etc.
  • Convert 000 of prices to K (or anything). E.g: 50000 will be 50K, or 50 thousand.
  • Override the default text string WooCommerce.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload onepagecheckout-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done. Go to WooCommerce->Settings->One Page Checkout to change plugin settings.
sections.faq:
I have an interface error with the current Theme, how to fix it?

If your theme has its own customizations go to the checkout page. For example css or hooks into default woocommerce.
It will affect the structure of the checkout page. Please create a new topic about your problem.

Do you have questions or issues with One Page Checkout for WooCommerce?

FB: https://fb.com/makiosp1 .

short_description: Combine Cart and Checkout process which gives users a faster checkout experience and best UI.

upgrade_notice.1.0: The current 1.0 version may not be fully compatible with your interface. Some css issues may cause the checkout page to not look exactly like the screenshot shown. Already compatible with: Flatsome, Storefront, Avada, Electro, ... and many more themes.
